feat.value: A brother asked an old man,
“My father, why is my heart hard and without fear of God?”
The old man said to him,
“I think that if a man holds blame in his heart,
he will acquire for himself fear of God.”
“Let a man upbraid his soul in everything, saying to it,
Remember that it is necessary for us to encounter God.'”
“What do I have to do with this man?”
“If one perseveres in these things, the fear of God comes to him.”
